attributes.action: Keep British Passport & not replace it with an EU passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU want the British public to swap our passport, and its traditional message from the British sovereign requesting 'assistance and protection' for the holder anywhere in the world 'in the Name of Her Majesty' with an EU version as a result of the new European Treaty.  The British passport date back to 1414, and has always been linked to our monarch: until 1778 they were all personally signed. If the EU have there way, the Royal Coat of Arms will soon no longer be visable on the front of our passports, the 12 stars on a blue background will be there instead
